profile.title: Profile
profile.tagline: Design, code, and automation. Everything needed for a product.

whatIDo.title: About Me
whatIDo.description: Started as a UI/UX designer. Later became a product designer — thinking systematically, learning metrics. Then coding: building interfaces, writing Telegram bots, working with APIs. With the advent of AI, I began automating tasks, writing GPT prompts and working faster.
whatIDo.summary: Today, I work at the intersection of design → code → AI. I launch projects, MVPs and experiments on my own.

workExperience.title: Work Experience
workExperience.freelancehunt: Working on product, UX design, features, user scenarios, and design system.
workExperience.freelance: UX/UI for startups and businesses: over 20+ mobile and web product projects, full cycle from idea to final UI.

aiChat.title: AI Clone Chat
aiChat.description: Ask me about UX/UI design, development, pricing, or past projects like MOU.today and Holyheld!
